name: Monster Farm
description: Here is a real farm monsters in which you have to grow your own monsters, developing them to more advanced creatures. Build the most profitable farm in the district!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: Core2Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 Storage: 350 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 400 MB available space
